document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Palaearctic (excluding Middle East, North Africa, Middle Asia) ( Alonso-Zarazaga 2011c )

Biology. Forests, shrublands, gardens. Adults occur in IV–VII. On Rosaceae :
Prunus spinosa
,
P. avium
,
P. cerasus
,
P. domestica
, occasionally on
Crataegus
sp.,
Pyrus
sp.,
Malus
sp. ( Dieckmann 1974 ).
